name: Ball & Ball
description:
Ball&Ball is a simple 3D platformer where you as a ball have to find the other ball to finish the level, you are also task to collect coins and cogs, when you collect all the collectibles in the level the orange bar on the right fills up when the bar is full all bomb hazards disappear, be careful though for each level has some hazards and tricks in them, go forth mr ball and find the other ball.

this is just a simple prototype i made using a lecture from Udemy and i've decided to add it here as part of my portfolio.
